title: Alibaba’s Next Challenge: a Sputtering Chinese Economy
sub_head: China’s iconic tech firm barely weathered the tech crackdown in 2021, and 2022 could be just as bad
body:
Alibaba had a horrendous 2021. Unfortunately, this year probably won’t be any better.
Worried policy makers in Beijing have begun signaling they want to give Chinese Big Tech a break—but that is only because the overall picture for China’s economy, and consumers in particular, has darkened so much.
